data.introduce: 订座记录转换接口实现了黑屏RRT指令功能，使用该接口可将航空公司系统记录转换为代理人系统记录（国内/国外）。
data.business: 支持代理人在CRS系统将航空公司系统的订座记录转换为CRS系统记录。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirReclaimPNRRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订座记录转换(AIG)请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"ReclaimPNRInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Option","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国内或国外航司，V：国内航司；D：国外航司；","children":[]},{"name":"ICSPNR","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"icsPNR号。航空公司纪录编号。","children":[]},{"name":"FullFlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号，如：CA1832","children":[]},{"name":"FlightDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航班日期，国内航司必填，国外航司非必填。格式：yyyyMMdd，如：20220406","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirReclaimPNRRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订座记录转换(AIG)响应","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（中文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PNR","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"CrsPNR号","children":[]}]}]

","msgZh":" 输入参数出错 "},{"code":" -84121 ","name":null,"msg":" PNR MATCH NOT FOUND ","msgZh":" 未查询到该PNR "},{"code":" -84122 ","name":null,"msg":" PNR SECURED ","msgZh":" 无权查看该PNR "},{"code":" -84123 ","name":null,"msg":" PNR ALREADY ON THIS SYSTEM ","msgZh":" 该PNR已存在 "},{"code":" -84124 ","name":null,"msg":" RETRIEVAL OF THIS PNR NOT ALLOWED ","msgZh":" 不允许检索该PNR "}]
